testsuite.name: com.w2a.testcases.TaskCreationTest
testsuite.system-out: Click on Task nav-bar button Click on add Task button Checking pop-up appeared Pop-up appeared to enter details of new task Enter new Task Title Click on add Title button Enter new Task Description Click on Task Status drop down button Select Task Status Click on Task Type drop down button Select Task Type Click on Task Priority drop down button Select Task Priority Click on Task Close button Check task is created New Task is created successfully Click to see screenshot Screenshot
